Posts.Content: Hope you have an answer by now. The redness that I had was cellulitis and I was given IV Vancomycin. Your reaction seems to be something far more serious. Don't give up, keep going back until they figure it out. good luck
Posts.Title: Extreme redness and swelling??

Posts.Content: Best wishes for the next 2 Tuesdays. Don't give in to the insurance companies. If she was going to an approved doctor to begin with, they don't have a leg to stand on. But, it will be a fight. But, for now, just get through the bx. Everyone else will have to wait in line for their turn. As the old lady said to the bill collector, I put all my bills in a hat and the one I pull out I pay, if he didn't leave her alone, she wouldn't put him in the hat next month. Cheers and best wishes. I am a 12 year survivor and as everyone has said, my husband was my rock.
Posts.Title: Scared for my Wife

Posts.Content: Josh, just wanted you to know that we are still reading your messages. My ca. was deep, so can't help. Anxious  to hear your news on Tues.

Posts.Title: Scared for my Wife

Posts.Content: My experience has been the same. I remember that I told my surgeon that it shouldn't get out that radiation firms the breast. He said that gravity would win. Maybe when I am in my 90's. My  cancer breast is still higher and firmer after 12 yrs. and I am 68. I do a lot of stretching exercises, but there is definitely a lot of scar tissue. The numbness all seems to be gone though. Best wishes.
Posts.Title: Post Radiation Treatments
